entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Omnibus 2001/5. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-E61: TÁRKI Omnibus 2001/5. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.. data sheet. Version: 2007-02-13

entry.dcterms:subject: 2004-03-00: the labels of the data file are corrected and complemented
entry.dcterms:description: 1) party preferences, popularity of politicians, evaluation of the work of the government and opposition, subjective financial situation, evaluating the economic situation of Hungary 2) evaluation about the inflation rate, expectations about inflation, opinions about Eu accession, intentions to go abroad to work in EU countries 3) workplace harms, knowledge about work protection, health damaging factors
entry.dcterms:subject: economic conditions and indicators
working conditions
international politics and organisations
labour and employment
mass political behavior, attitudes
economic policy
political institutions, public administration
person
survey data
cross-section

A multi-stage proportionally stratified random probability sample representative of the Hungarian adult population. Unsuccessful inquiries were substituted with supplementary addresses, where persons to be interviewed were selected on the basis of the Leslie Kish key.
face-to-face interview
A
